name: Thorani SOOOB (ธรณีสูบ)
description:
Story

This is a story about a cannibal forest where there is frequent news of tourists disappearing in this area. We will play the role of the cause of the problem, which will use roots to trap and eat people as food to survive, For survival, they will compete to catch the most prey.

How to play

  • Use 2 joysticks or 1 joystick and keyboard to play
  • Press Start on the joystick to join
  • Press Spacebar on the keyboard to join
  • Use your skill to catch people and then pull them down to the ground to get scores

Joystick
(Left Analog) - Move
(Right Analog) - Pull people
(DPad Left/Right) - Select color
(A) - Skill 1 (Shoot root to catch the people)
(X) - Skill 2 (Place root wall to block the path and also can destroy skill 1 of another player)
(Y) - Skill 3 (Place root trap to catch people who walk into it)
(B) - Cancel Skill

Keyboard
(WASD) - Move
(Arrow key Up/Down) - Pull people
(Arrow key Left/Right) - Select color
(J) - Skill 1 (Shoot root to catch the people)
(U) - Skill 2 (Place root wall to block the path and also can destroy skill 1 of another player)
(I) - Skill 3 (Place root trap to catch people who walk into it)
(K) - Cancel Skill

GitHub
https://github.com/Werasilz/Thorani_SOOOB_GGJ_2023

Submission to Global Game Jam 2023 - Popular Vote Award (Jam site Rangsit University)
https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%93%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%...
